title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
**Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc: Revolutionize Your Outdoor Fun**

Are you ready to elevate your outdoor games and activities? Look no further than the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate game-changer in the world of frisbees. With its cutting-edge technology and features, this flying disc is sure to bring endless fun and excitement to your backyard gatherings, camping trips, and park playdates.

**Unparalleled Brightness and Color Options**

The TOSY Flying Disc boasts an astonishing 16 million color RGB LED light system, available in 36 or 360 LED options. With a brightness that's 100 times more intense than any other light-up flying disc on the market, you'll be able to play long after the sun goes down. Whether you're playing a casual game of catch or competing in a high-stakes tournament, the TOSY Flying Disc's vibrant lights will illuminate the night and add an extra layer of excitement to your game.

**Smart Modes and Motion Sensors**

Take your gameplay to the next level with the TOSY Flying Disc's advanced smart modes and motion sensors. With features like automatic light control, brightness level adjustments, and timer modes, you can customize your gameplay experience to suit your style. Plus, the disc's motion sensors ensure that the lights turn on and off automatically, conserving battery life and minimizing distractions.

**Rechargeable and Long-Lasting**

The TOSY Flying Disc is designed to keep you playing all night long. With a quick 30-minute charge, you can enjoy up to 90 minutes of continuous playtime or over 1,000 throws in B1&T0 modes. The included USB Type C to C cable makes it easy to recharge your disc on the go.

**Professional-Grade Quality and Durability**

Built to withstand the demands of frequent use, the TOSY Flying Disc meets professional ultimate standards and is designed to provide a long, straight, and precise flight. The disc's high-quality materials and construction ensure that it will withstand the elements and rough play, while its waterproof design keeps the electronics safe and secure.

**Perfect Gift for Outdoor Enthusiasts**

Whether you're shopping for a birthday gift, a Christmas present, or a unique addition to your camping gear, the TOSY Flying Disc is the perfect choice. Its versatility and durability make it suitable for players of all ages and skill levels, from casual backyard throwers to competitive ultimate players.

**Get Ready to Take Your Outdoor Games to New Heights**

Order your TOSY Flying Disc today and experience the ultimate in outdoor fun and excitement. With its unparalleled brightness, smart modes, and long-lasting battery life, this flying disc is sure to become your new favorite outdoor companion.
